Detailed Description

Object Representing a Gray Picture.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Picture* GrayPicture::clone (  )  [virtual]

Get a "clone" of this picture.

A clone is also a copy. If you'd like another copy of this picture use this function.

Example: Picture* pic = robot.takePicture("color"); Picture* pic2 = pic->clone();

From this you'll have two "copies" of the same picture, so you're free to change around "pic" without worry of changing "pic2"

Returns:
A clone of this picture

Implements Picture.

virtual bool GrayPicture::loadPicture ( const char *  filename  )  [virtual]

Load an image from a filename, for now, only jpeg files are supported.

Returns:
True if load sucessful, false if fails (for wrong colorspace, etc.)

Implements Picture.

virtual void GrayPicture::savePicture ( const char *  filename  )  [virtual]

Save an image to a file, only jpeg files are supported.

A .jpg will be appended to the given filename.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file you save (without the .jpg file extention)

Implements Picture.
